message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.IR 

The paper proposes a novel approach to sentiment classification using lifelong learning, which involves retaining knowledge learned from past tasks to help future learning. This approach is based on a Bayesian optimization framework and stochastic gradient descent. Given the focus on machine learning and natural language processing, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.CL (Computation and Language), and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Additionally, the use of image and text data for sentiment classification suggests possible relevance to cs.CV (Computer Vision) and cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
